```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(ggspatial)
library(tmap)
```

```{r}
flow_stl <- st_read("./data/Flowline_STL/Flowline_STL_20220928.shp")
flood_stl <- st_read("./data/Floodplain_STL/Floodplain_STL_20220928.shp")
subs_stl <- st_read("./data/Subbasins_STL/Subbasins_STL_20220928.shp")
```


```{r}
#read in flow data 
flow_df <- fortify(flow_stl)




```

```{r}
flow_sf <- st_zm(flow_stl, what = "ZM")
flood_sf <- st_zm(flood_stl, what = "ZM")
subs_sf <- st_zm(subs_stl, what = "ZM")
```


### Flow Map 
```{r}



ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = subs_stl, aes()) +
  geom_sf(data = flow_sf, aes(color = Habitat)) +
  geom_sf(data = flood_sf, aes(fill = Period)) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Stillaguamish Basin", color = "Stream type", fill = "Wetland Status")
```
